** Tender Announcement - Sign Language Interpretation Services**
==========================================================

**Solicitation Number:** E60ZS-241444/A
**Reference Number:** PW-ZF-500-41511
**Publication Date:** 2024-03-06

### Background

Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of the Translation Bureau, invites interested suppliers to submit a proposal for sign language interpretation services. The Translation Bureau seeks suppliers to provide distance interpretation services in sign language on an "as and when required" basis, as well as to support its various operational requirements for parliamentary and conference interpretation in both official languages.

### Requirement Description

The Translation Bureau requires suppliers who hold an accreditation issued by the Bureau and are able to meet the requirements under this request for proposal (RFP). The successful bidder will provide:

* Stream 1: American Sign Language (ASL) interpretation services
* Stream 2: Langue des signes québécoise (LSQ) interpretation services

### Term of the Subsequent Contract

The term of any subsequent contract will be for one (1) year with three (3) irrevocable option periods of one (1) year each.

### Security Requirements

Security requirements are associated with this requirement. Suppliers should consult Part 6 - Security, Financial and Other Requirements, and Part 7 - Resulting Contract Clauses for more information.

### Selection Criteria

Bids will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price. The selection ratio will be 60% for technical merit and 40% for price.

### Basis for Canada's Ownership of Intellectual Property

Public Works and Government Services Canada/Translation Bureau has determined that any intellectual property rights arising from the performance of the work under the resulting contract will belong to Canada, except for computer software and all documentation pertaining to that software.

### Documents

The solicitation documents may be downloaded from [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/). Suppliers are invited to submit their proposal by [Tender Closing Date](#closing_date).

### Closing Date
The tender closing date is 2024-04-12T14:00:00.
